content: fab retro potholders 1 in an array of beautiful colours crocheted using rainbow cotton 8/4 2 which is available in numerous beautiful colours so you re guaranteed to find exactly the right colour to match your retro potholders to your kitchen enjoy **materials ** - crochet hook 2 5 mm us b-1 - rainbow cotton 8/4 5 different colors - leather string for straps **measurements ** approx 20 x 21 5 cm **usage per set ** color 1 approx 4g color 2 approx 6g color 3 approx 8g color 4 approx 10g color 5 approx 60g **abbreviations ** **magic_ring** magic_ring **chain** chain stitch **st** stitch es **single_crochet** single_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **ws** wrong side 1 https //hobbii com/retro-pot-holders-mix utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=retro-pot-holders-mix&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow84&utm_term=swr
